```diff
+ <script setup lang="ts">

+ 
+ // ä»App.vueæ³¨å…¥çš„æš—é»‘æ¨¡å¼çŠ¶æ€
+ const isDarkMode = inject('isDarkMode', ref(false));
+ const toggleDarkMode = inject('toggleDarkMode', () => {});
+ const darkMode = computed({
+   get: () => isDarkMode.value,
+   set: (value) => {
+     isDarkMode.value = value;

+ 
+ // åˆ‡æ¢ä¸»é¢˜

+ // ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
```

```diff
+ const truncateText = (text: string, maxLength: number) => {
+   if (!text) return '';
+   if (text.length <= maxLength) return text;
+   return text.substring(0, maxLength) + '...';
+ };
+ 
+ // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¥æœŸ
+ const formatDate = (date: string) => {
+   if (!date) return '';
+   try {
+     return format(new Date(date), 'yyyy-MM-dd');
+   } catch (error) {
+     return date;
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // æ ¹æ®èµ„æºç±»å‹è¿”å›ä¸åŒçš„æ ‡ç­¾æ ·å¼

+     'å°è¯´': 'warning',
+     'éŸ³ä¹': 'info',
+     'æ¸¸æˆ': 'danger'
+   };
+   
+   return types[type as keyof typeof types] || 'info';
+ };
```

è¿™ç§æ–¹æ³•ç›´æ¥ä»åˆ†å‘åŒ…ä¸­åŠ è½½ä¸­æ–‡è¯­è¨€æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåº”è¯¥èƒ½å¤Ÿé€‚ç”¨äºå½“å‰ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„Element Plusã€‚

## å®Œæ•´ä¿®æ”¹åçš„main.tsæ–‡ä»¶åº”ä¸ºï¼š

```typescript
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import { createPinia } from 'pinia'
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus'
import 'element-plus/dist/index.css'
import * as ElementPlusIconsVue from '@element-plus/icons-vue'
import zhCn from "element-plus/dist/locale/zh-cn.mjs"
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
import './style.css'

// åˆ›å»ºåº”ç”¨å®ä¾‹
const app = createApp(App)

// æ³¨å†Œæ‰€æœ‰Element Pluså›¾æ ‡
for (const [key, component] of Object.entries(ElementPlusIconsVue)) {
  app.component(key, component)
}

// å…¨å±€é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
app.config.errorHandler = (err, instance, info) => {
  console.error('å…¨å±€é”™è¯¯ï¼š', err)
  console.error('é”™è¯¯ä½ç½®ï¼š', info)
}

// åº”ç”¨æŒ‚è½½å‰æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€
const initApp = async () => {
  const pinia = createPinia()
  app.use(pinia)
  
  // é…ç½®Element Plusï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡
  app.use(ElementPlus, {
    locale: zhCn,
    size: 'default',
  })
  
  app.use(router)
  
  // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ä¿å­˜çš„ä¸»é¢˜æ¨¡å¼
  const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme')
  if (savedTheme === 'dark') {
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', 'dark')
  }
  
  // åº”ç”¨æŒ‚è½½
  app.mount('#app')
  
  console.log('åŠ¨æ¼«ç¤¾äº¤å¹³å°åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ ğŸš€')
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–åº”ç”¨
initApp().catch(e => {
  console.error('åº”ç”¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±è´¥ï¼š', e)
})
```

## é—®é¢˜åˆ†æ

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºèµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢å’Œèµ„æºè¯¦æƒ…é¡µé¢ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <div class="resource-list-container">
+     <div class="page-header">
+       <h1>åŠ¨æ¼«èµ„æº</h1>
+       <div class="filter-bar">
+         <el-input 
+           v-model="searchKeyword" 
+           placeholder="æœç´¢èµ„æº" 
+           prefix-icon="Search" 
+           class="search-input"
+           @input="handleSearch"
+           clearable
+         />
+         <el-select v-model="selectedType" placeholder="ç±»å‹" class="filter-select" @change="handleFilter">
+           <el-option label="å…¨éƒ¨" value="" />
+           <el-option v-for="type in resourceTypes" :key="type" :label="type" :value="type" />
+         </el-select>
+         <el-select v-model="sortOrder" placeholder="æ’åº" class="filter-select" @change="handleSort">
+           <el-option label="æœ€æ–°å‘å¸ƒ" value="newest" />
+           <el-option label="æœ€å¤šæ”¶è—" value="favorites" />
+           <el-option label="æœ€é«˜è¯„åˆ†" value="rating" />
+         </el-select>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+

+           v-for="resource in filteredResources"

+           :xs="24" 
+           :sm="12" 
+           :md="8"

+         </el-col>
+       </el-row>
+ 
+       <!-- åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€ -->

+         <el-skeleton :rows="3" animated />
+         <el-skeleton :rows="3" animated />
+         <el-skeleton :rows="3" animated />
+       </div>
+ 
+       <!-- æ— ç»“æœçŠ¶æ€ -->
+       <div v-if="!loading && filteredResources.length === 0" class="empty-state">
+         <el-empty description="æš‚æ— èµ„æº" />
+       </div>
+ 
+       <!-- åˆ†é¡µ -->
+       <div class="pagination-container" v-if="totalResources > pageSize">
+         <el-pagination
+           background
+           layout="prev, pager, next"
+           :total="totalResources"
+           :page-size="pageSize"
+           :current-page="currentPage"
+           @current-change="handlePageChange"
+         />
+       </div>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- æ–°å¢èµ„æºæŒ‰é’® -->
+     <el-button 
+       v-if="isLoggedIn" 
+       type="primary" 
+       circle 
+       class="add-button" 
+       @click="showAddResourceDialog = true"
+     >
+       <el-icon><Plus /></el-icon>
+     </el-button>
+ 
+     <!-- æ–°å¢èµ„æºå¯¹è¯æ¡† -->
+     <el-dialog
+       v-model="showAddResourceDialog"
+       title="å‘å¸ƒæ–°èµ„æº"
+       width="500px"
+       destroy-on-close
+       class="resource-dialog"
+     >
+       <el-form :model="newResource" :rules="rules" ref="resourceFormRef" label-width="80px">
+         <el-form-item label="æ ‡é¢˜" prop="title">
+           <el-input v-model="newResource.title" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜" />
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item label="ç±»å‹" prop="type">
+           <el-select v-model="newResource.type" placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©èµ„æºç±»å‹">
+             <el-option v-for="type in resourceTypes" :key="type" :label="type" :value="type" />
+           </el-select>
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item label="å°é¢å›¾" prop="coverImage">
+           <el-upload
+             action="/api/upload"
+             :on-success="handleCoverUploadSuccess"
+             :before-upload="beforeAvatarUpload"
+             class="cover-uploader"
+           >
+             <img v-if="newResource.coverImage" :src="newResource.coverImage" class="uploaded-cover" />
+             <el-icon v-else class="upload-icon"><Plus /></el-icon>
+           </el-upload>
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item label="é“¾æ¥" prop="link">
+           <el-input v-model="newResource.link" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºé“¾æ¥" />
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item label="ç®€ä»‹" prop="description">
+           <el-input 
+             v-model="newResource.description" 
+             type="textarea" 
+             :rows="4" 
+             placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºç®€ä»‹"
+           />
+         </el-form-item>
+       </el-form>
+       <template #footer>
+         <div class="dialog-footer">
+           <el-button @click="showAddResourceDialog = false">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
+           <el-button type="primary" @click="handleAddResource" :loading="submitting">å‘å¸ƒ</el-button>
+         </div>
+       </template>
+     </el-dialog>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, computed, onMounted, reactive } from 'vue';
+ import { useRouter } from 'vue-router';
+ import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus';
+ import { useUserStore } from '@/stores/user';
+ import { Plus, Search } from '@element-plus/icons-vue';
+ import ResourceCard from '@/components/ResourceCard.vue';
+ import type { Resource } from '@/types/resource';
+ 
+ const router = useRouter();
+ const userStore = useUserStore();
+ const isLoggedIn = computed(() => userStore.isLoggedIn);
+ 
+ // èµ„æºç±»å‹åˆ—è¡¨
+ const resourceTypes = ['åŠ¨ç”»', 'æ¼«ç”»', 'å°è¯´', 'éŸ³ä¹', 'æ¸¸æˆ'];
+ 
+ // èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨çŠ¶æ€
+ const loading = ref(true);
+ const currentPage = ref(1);
+ const pageSize = ref(12);
+ const totalResources = ref(0);
+ const resources = ref<Resource[]>([]);
+ const filteredResources = ref<Resource[]>([]);
+ 
+ // ç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶
+ const searchKeyword = ref('');
+ const selectedType = ref('');
+ const sortOrder = ref('newest');
+ 
+ // æ–°å¢èµ„æºçŠ¶æ€
+ const showAddResourceDialog = ref(false);
+ const submitting = ref(false);
+ const resourceFormRef = ref();
+ const newResource = reactive({
+   title: '',
+   type: '',
+   description: '',
+   coverImage: '',
+   link: ''
+ });
+ 
+ // è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+ const rules = {
+   title: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 2, max: 50, message: 'æ ‡é¢˜é•¿åº¦åœ¨2åˆ°50ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¹‹é—´', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   type: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·é€‰æ‹©èµ„æºç±»å‹', trigger: 'change' }
+   ],
+   description: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºç®€ä»‹', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 10, max: 500, message: 'ç®€ä»‹é•¿åº¦åœ¨10åˆ°500ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¹‹é—´', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   link: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºé“¾æ¥', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { pattern: /^(https?:\/\/)/, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æœ‰æ•ˆçš„é“¾æ¥åœ°å€', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ };
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶è·å–èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨
+ onMounted(async () => {
+   await fetchResources();
+ });
+ 
+ // è·å–èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨
+ const fetchResources = async () => {
+   loading.value = true;
+   try {
+     // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAPIè°ƒç”¨
+     setTimeout(() => {
+       // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
+       const mockData: Resource[] = Array.from({ length: 20 }, (_, index) => ({
+         id: index + 1,
+         title: `åŠ¨æ¼«èµ„æº${index + 1}`,
+         type: resourceTypes[Math.floor(Math.random() * resourceTypes.length)],
+         description: `è¿™æ˜¯åŠ¨æ¼«èµ„æº${index + 1}çš„ç®€ä»‹ï¼Œå†…å®¹ç²¾å½©çº·å‘ˆï¼Œæ¬¢è¿è§‚çœ‹ã€‚`,
+         coverImage: `https://picsum.photos/300/200?random=${index + 1}`,
+         createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - Math.floor(Math.random() * 30) * 86400000).toISOString(),
+         link: 'https://example.com',
+         favoriteCount: Math.floor(Math.random() * 100),
+         rating: (Math.random() * 5).toFixed(1)
+       }));
+       
+       resources.value = mockData;
+       filteredResources.value = mockData;
+       totalResources.value = mockData.length;
+       loading.value = false;
+     }, 1000);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('è·å–èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:', error);
+     ElMessage.error('è·å–èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•');
+     loading.value = false;
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†æœç´¢
+ const handleSearch = () => {
+   applyFilters();
+ };
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ç±»å‹ç­›é€‰
+ const handleFilter = () => {
+   applyFilters();
+ };
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†æ’åº
+ const handleSort = () => {
+   applyFilters();
+ };
+ 
+ // åº”ç”¨æ‰€æœ‰ç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶
+ const applyFilters = () => {
+   // å…ˆæ ¹æ®å…³é”®è¯å’Œç±»å‹è¿‡æ»¤
+   let filtered = resources.value.filter(resource => {
+     const matchesKeyword = !searchKeyword.value || 
+       resource.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchKeyword.value.toLowerCase()) ||
+       resource.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchKeyword.value.toLowerCase());
+     
+     const matchesType = !selectedType.value || resource.type === selectedType.value;
+     
+     return matchesKeyword && matchesType;
+   });
+   
+   // ç„¶åæ ¹æ®æ’åºæ¡ä»¶æ’åº
+   filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => {
+     if (sortOrder.value === 'newest') {
+       return new Date(b.createdAt).getTime() - new Date(a.createdAt).getTime();
+     } else if (sortOrder.value === 'favorites') {
+       return b.favoriteCount - a.favoriteCount;
+     } else if (sortOrder.value === 'rating') {
+       return parseFloat(b.rating) - parseFloat(a.rating);
+     }
+     return 0;
+   });
+   
+   filteredResources.value = filtered;
+ };
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†é¡µé¢å˜åŒ–
+ const handlePageChange = (page: number) => {
+   currentPage.value = page;
+   // å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ·»åŠ åˆ†é¡µé€»è¾‘ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨åç«¯åˆ†é¡µ
+ };
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†å°é¢ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ
+ const handleCoverUploadSuccess = (response: any) => {
+   newResource.coverImage = response.data.url;
+ };
+ 
+ // ä¸Šä¼ å‰æ£€æŸ¥
+ const beforeAvatarUpload = (file: File) => {
+   const isImage = /^image\/(jpeg|png|gif|jpg)$/.test(file.type);
+   const isLt2M = file.size / 1024 / 1024 < 2;
+ 
+   if (!isImage) {
+     ElMessage.error('ä¸Šä¼ å°é¢å›¾ç‰‡åªèƒ½æ˜¯å›¾ç‰‡æ ¼å¼!');
+   }
+   if (!isLt2M) {
+     ElMessage.error('ä¸Šä¼ å°é¢å›¾ç‰‡å¤§å°ä¸èƒ½è¶…è¿‡ 2MB!');
+   }
+   return isImage && isLt2M;
+ };
+ 
+ // æ·»åŠ èµ„æº
+ const handleAddResource = async () => {
+   if (!isLoggedIn.value) {
+     ElMessage.warning('è¯·å…ˆç™»å½•');
+     router.push('/login');
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   if (!resourceFormRef.value) return;
+   
+   await resourceFormRef.value.validate(async (valid: boolean) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       submitting.value = true;
+       try {
+         // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAPIè°ƒç”¨
+         setTimeout(() => {
+           // æ·»åŠ åˆ°æœ¬åœ°åˆ—è¡¨
+           const newId = resources.value.length + 1;
+           const resourceToAdd: Resource = {
+             id: newId,
+             title: newResource.title,
+             type: newResource.type,
+             description: newResource.description,
+             coverImage: newResource.coverImage || `https://picsum.photos/300/200?random=${newId}`,
+             createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
+             link: newResource.link,
+             favoriteCount: 0,
+             rating: '0.0'
+           };
+           
+           resources.value.unshift(resourceToAdd);
+           applyFilters();
+           
+           ElMessage.success('èµ„æºå‘å¸ƒæˆåŠŸ');
+           showAddResourceDialog.value = false;
+           
+           // é‡ç½®è¡¨å•
+           newResource.title = '';
+           newResource.type = '';
+           newResource.description = '';
+           newResource.coverImage = '';
+           newResource.link = '';
+           
+           submitting.value = false;
+         }, 1000);
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('å‘å¸ƒèµ„æºå¤±è´¥:', error);
+         ElMessage.error('å‘å¸ƒèµ„æºå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•');
+         submitting.value = false;
+       }
+     }
+   });
+ };
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .resource-list-container {
+   max-width: var(--container-width);
+   margin: 0 auto;
+   padding: var(--spacing-4);
+ }
+ 
+ .page-header {
+   margin-bottom: var(--spacing-8);
+ }
+ 
+ .page-header h1 {
+   font-size: var(--font-size-3xl);
+   color: var(--text-primary);
+   margin-bottom: var(--spacing-4);
+ }
+ 
+ .filter-bar {
+   display: flex;
+   gap: var(--spacing-4);
+   margin-bottom: var(--spacing-4);
+   flex-wrap: wrap;
+ }
+ 
+ .search-input {
+   flex: 1;
+   min-width: 200px;
+ }
+ 
+ .filter-select {
+   width: 150px;
+ }
+ 
+ .content-section {
+   margin-bottom: var(--spacing-8);
+ }
+ 
+ .resource-col {
+   margin-bottom: var(--spacing-6);
+ }
+ 
+ .loading-container {
+   padding: var(--spacing-8) 0;
+ }
+ 
+ .empty-state {
+   padding: var(--spacing-16) 0;
+   text-align: center;
+ }
+ 
+ .pagination-container {
+   margin-top: var(--spacing-8);
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: center;
+ }
+ 
+ .add-button {
+   position: fixed;
+   right: var(--spacing-6);
+   bottom: var(--spacing-6);
+   box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
+   font-size: 20px;
+   width: 56px;
+   height: 56px;
+   z-index: 10;
+ }
+ 
+ /* ä¸Šä¼ ç»„ä»¶æ ·å¼ */
+ .cover-uploader {
+   width: 100%;
+   border: 1px dashed var(--gray-400);
+   border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
+   overflow: hidden;

+   width: 100%;

+   object-fit: cover;
+   display: block;

+ /* å“åº”å¼è®¾è®¡ */

+   }

+   .add-button {
+     right: var(--spacing-4);
+     bottom: var(--spacing-4);
+   }
+ }
+ </style>
```

```diff
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, computed, onMounted, reactive } from 'vue';
+ import { useRoute, useRouter } from 'vue-router';

+ 
+ const route = useRoute();
+ const router = useRouter();
+ const userStore = useUserStore();
+ 
+ // ç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€
+ const isLoggedIn = computed(() => userStore.isLoggedIn);
+ const isAdmin = computed(() => userStore.isAdmin);
+ const isOwner = ref(false);
+ 
+ // èµ„æºçŠ¶æ€
+ const resourceId = computed(() => Number(route.params.id));
+ const resource = ref<Resource | null>(null);
+ const loading = ref(true);
+ const defaultAvatar = 'https://cube.elemecdn.com/3/7c/3ea6beec64369c2642b92c6726f1epng.png';
+ const resourceRating = ref(0);
+ 
+ // è¯„è®ºçŠ¶æ€
+ const comments = ref<any[]>([]);
+ const newComment = ref('');
+ const newRating = ref(3);
+ const submitting = ref(false);
+ const commentPage = ref(1);
+ const commentPageSize = ref(5);
+ const commentTotal = ref(0);
+ 
+ // ç¼–è¾‘çŠ¶æ€
+ const showEditDialog = ref(false);
+ const editFormRef = ref();
+ const editForm = reactive({
+   title: '',
+   type: '',
+   description: '',
+   link: ''
+ });
+ 
+ // èµ„æºç±»å‹åˆ—è¡¨
+ const resourceTypes = ['åŠ¨ç”»', 'æ¼«ç”»', 'å°è¯´', 'éŸ³ä¹', 'æ¸¸æˆ'];
+ 
+ // ç›¸å…³èµ„æº
+ const relatedResources = ref<Resource[]>([]);
+ 
+ // è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+ const rules = {
+   title: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 2, max: 50, message: 'æ ‡é¢˜é•¿åº¦åœ¨2åˆ°50ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¹‹é—´', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   type: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·é€‰æ‹©èµ„æºç±»å‹', trigger: 'change' }
+   ],
+   description: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºç®€ä»‹', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 10, max: 500, message: 'ç®€ä»‹é•¿åº¦åœ¨10åˆ°500ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¹‹é—´', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   link: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥èµ„æºé“¾æ¥', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { pattern: /^(https?:\/\/)/, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æœ‰æ•ˆçš„é“¾æ¥åœ°å€', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ };
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶è·å–èµ„æºè¯¦æƒ…
+ onMounted(async () => {
+   if (!resourceId.value) {
+     router.push('/resources');
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   await Promise.all([
+     fetchResourceDetail(),
+     fetchComments()
+   ]);
+ });
+ 
+ // è·å–èµ„æºè¯¦æƒ…
+ const fetchResourceDetail = async () => {
+   loading.value = true;
+   try {
+     // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAPIè°ƒç”¨
+     setTimeout(() => {
+       // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
+       const mockResource: Resource = {
+         id: resourceId.value,
+         title: `åŠ¨æ¼«èµ„æº${resourceId.value}`,
+         type: resourceTypes[Math.floor(Math.random() * resourceTypes.length)],
+         description: `è¿™æ˜¯åŠ¨æ¼«èµ„æº${resourceId.value}çš„è¯¦ç»†ä»‹ç»ã€‚æœ¬èµ„æºéå¸¸ç²¾å½©ï¼ŒåŒ…å«äº†ç²¾ç¾çš„ç”»é¢ã€æ‰£äººå¿ƒå¼¦çš„å‰§æƒ…å’Œæ·±åˆ»çš„ä¸»é¢˜ã€‚å¸Œæœ›å„ä½åŠ¨æ¼«çˆ±å¥½è€…èƒ½å¤Ÿå–œæ¬¢ï¼\n\næœ¬èµ„æºé€‚åˆå„ä¸ªå¹´é¾„æ®µçš„è§‚ä¼—ï¼Œæ— è®ºæ˜¯åŠ¨æ¼«æ–°æ‰‹è¿˜æ˜¯èµ„æ·±çˆ±å¥½è€…ï¼Œéƒ½èƒ½ä»ä¸­è·å¾—ä¹è¶£å’Œæ€è€ƒã€‚\n\nå¦‚æœ‰ä»»ä½•é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿åœ¨è¯„è®ºåŒºç•™è¨€è®¨è®ºã€‚`,
+         coverImage: `https://picsum.photos/800/450?random=${resourceId.value}`,
+         createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - Math.floor(Math.random() * 30) * 86400000).toISOString(),
+         link: 'https://example.com',
+         favoriteCount: Math.floor(Math.random() * 100),
+         rating: (Math.random() * 5).toFixed(1),
+         publisher: 'ç”¨æˆ·' + Math.floor(Math.random() * 100)
+       };
+       
+       resource.value = mockResource;
+       resourceRating.value = parseFloat(mockResource.rating);
+       
+       // åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºèµ„æºå‘å¸ƒè€…
+       isOwner.value = Math.random() > 0.5; // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
+       
+       // è·å–ç›¸å…³èµ„æº
+       fetchRelatedResources();
+       
+       loading.value = false;
+       
+       // åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¼–è¾‘è¡¨å•
+       editForm.title = mockResource.title;
+       editForm.type = mockResource.type;
+       editForm.description = mockResource.description;
+       editForm.link = mockResource.link;
+     }, 1000);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('è·å–èµ„æºè¯¦æƒ…å¤±è´¥:', error);
+     ElMessage.error('è·å–èµ„æºè¯¦æƒ…å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•');
+     loading.value = false;
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // è·å–ç›¸å…³èµ„æº
+ const fetchRelatedResources = () => {
+   if (!resource.value) return;
+   
+   // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç›¸å…³èµ„æºæ•°æ®
+   const mockRelated: Resource[] = Array.from({ length: 3 }, (_, index) => ({
+     id: resourceId.value + index + 1,
+     title: `ç›¸å…³åŠ¨æ¼«èµ„æº${index + 1}`,
+     type: resource.value?.type || resourceTypes[Math.floor(Math.random() * resourceTypes.length)],
+     description: `è¿™æ˜¯ç›¸å…³åŠ¨æ¼«èµ„æº${index + 1}çš„ç®€ä»‹`,
+     coverImage: `https://picsum.photos/300/200?random=${resourceId.value + index + 1}`,
+     createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - Math.floor(Math.random() * 30) * 86400000).toISOString(),
+     link: 'https://example.com',
+     favoriteCount: Math.floor(Math.random() * 100),
+     rating: (Math.random() * 5).toFixed(1)
+   }));
+   
+   relatedResources.value = mockRelated;
+ };
+ 
+ // è·å–è¯„è®ºåˆ—è¡¨
+ const fetchComments = () => {
+   // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè¯„è®ºæ•°æ®
+   const mockComments = Array.from({ length: 8 }, (_, index) => ({
+     id: index + 1,
+     username: `ç”¨æˆ·${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100)}`,
+     avatar: `https://cube.elemecdn.com/3/7c/3ea6beec64369c2642b92c6726f1epng.png`,
+     content: `è¿™æ˜¯å¯¹åŠ¨æ¼«èµ„æº${resourceId.value}çš„è¯„è®ºï¼Œéå¸¸ç²¾å½©çš„èµ„æºï¼æ¨èç»™å¤§å®¶ã€‚`,
+     rating: Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 1,
+     createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - Math.floor(Math.random() * 30) * 86400000).toISOString()
+   }));
+   
+   comments.value = mockComments.slice(0, commentPageSize.value);
+   commentTotal.value = mockComments.length;
+ };
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†è¯„è®ºåˆ†é¡µå˜åŒ–
+ const handleCommentPageChange = (page: number) => {
+   commentPage.value = page;
+   // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿåˆ†é¡µ
+   const start = (page - 1) * commentPageSize.value;
+   const end = start + commentPageSize.value;
+   
+   // å‡è®¾æœ‰æ›´å¤šè¯„è®ºæ•°æ®
+   const mockComments = Array.from({ length: commentTotal.value }, (_, index) => ({
+     id: index + 1,
+     username: `ç”¨æˆ·${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100)}`,
+     avatar: `https://cube.elemecdn.com/3/7c/3ea6beec64369c2642b92c6726f1epng.png`,
+     content: `ç¬¬${page}é¡µçš„è¯„è®º${index % commentPageSize.value + 1}ï¼Œéå¸¸ç²¾å½©çš„èµ„æºï¼æ¨èç»™å¤§å®¶ã€‚`,
+     rating: Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 1,
+     createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - Math.floor(Math.random() * 30) * 86400000).toISOString()
+   }));
+   
+   comments.value = mockComments.slice(start, end);
+ };
+ 
+ // æäº¤è¯„è®º
+ const submitComment = () => {
+   if (!isLoggedIn.value) {
+     ElMessage.warning('è¯·å…ˆç™»å½•');
+     router.push('/login');
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   if (!newComment.value.trim()) {
+     ElMessage.warning('è¯„è®ºå†…å®¹ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º');
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   submitting.value = true;
+   
+   // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAPIè°ƒç”¨
+   setTimeout(() => {
+     // æ·»åŠ æ–°è¯„è®ºåˆ°åˆ—è¡¨é¡¶éƒ¨
+     const newCommentObj = {
+       id: Date.now(),
+       username: userStore.userInfo.username,
+       avatar: userStore.userInfo.avatar || defaultAvatar,
+       content: newComment.value,
+       rating: newRating.value,
+       createdAt: new Date().toISOString()
+     };
+     
+     comments.value.unshift(newCommentObj);
+     commentTotal.value++;
+     
+     // æ›´æ–°èµ„æºè¯„åˆ†
+     const totalRating = comments.value.reduce((sum, comment) => sum + comment.rating, 0);
+     resourceRating.value = parseFloat((totalRating / comments.value.length).toFixed(1));
+     
+     if (resource.value) {
+       resource.value.rating = resourceRating.value.toString();
+     }
+     
+     // é‡ç½®è¡¨å•
+     newComment.value = '';
+     newRating.value = 3;
+     
+     ElMessage.success('è¯„è®ºå‘å¸ƒæˆåŠŸ');
+     submitting.value = false;
+   }, 1000);
+ };
+ 
+ // æ›´æ–°èµ„æºä¿¡æ¯
+ const updateResource = async () => {
+   if (!editFormRef.value) return;
+   
+   await editFormRef.value.validate(async (valid: boolean) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       submitting.value = true;
+       try {
+         // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAPIè°ƒç”¨
+         setTimeout(() => {
+           if (resource.value) {
+             // æ›´æ–°æœ¬åœ°èµ„æºä¿¡æ¯
+             resource.value.title = editForm.title;
+             resource.value.type = editForm.type;
+             resource.value.description = editForm.description;
+             resource.value.link = editForm.link;
+           }
+           
+           ElMessage.success('èµ„æºæ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
+           showEditDialog.value = false;
+           submitting.value = false;
+         }, 1000);
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ›´æ–°èµ„æºå¤±è´¥:', error);
+         ElMessage.error('æ›´æ–°èµ„æºå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•');
+         submitting.value = false;
+       }
+     }
+   });
+ };
+ 
+ // è®¿é—®èµ„æº
+ const openResource = () => {
+   if (!resource.value?.link) {
+     ElMessage.warning('èµ„æºé“¾æ¥ä¸å­˜åœ¨');
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   window.open(resource.value.link, '_blank');
+ };
+ 
+ // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¥æœŸ
+ const formatDate = (date: string) => {
+   if (!date) return '';
+   try {
+     return format(new Date(date), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm');
+   } catch (error) {
+     return date;
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // æ ¹æ®èµ„æºç±»å‹è¿”å›ä¸åŒçš„æ ‡ç­¾æ ·å¼
+ const getTagType = (type: string) => {
+   const types = {
+     'åŠ¨ç”»': 'primary',
+     'æ¼«ç”»': 'success',
+     'å°è¯´': 'warning',
+     'éŸ³ä¹': 'info',
+     'æ¸¸æˆ': 'danger'
```
